title: The Case Against Adnan Syed - Addendum 3 – Tap Tap Tap
description:
March 28, 2019 / Jon Cryer hosts addendum 3 covering episode 3 of the HBO docuseries #TheCaseAgainstAdnanSyed. He is joined by Rabia Chaudry, Susan Simpson, and guest panelist Nikisha Horton.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Parcast and Article.

Search and subscribe to the Survival podcast on the Parcast Network or wherever you get your podcasts!
